Content: A professional at the request of the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) delivered a lecture on ‘Leadership & Management’ for Senior Officers serving Divisions, Brigades and all formations under command to the SFHQ-MLT on Monday (1). Mr Mohomad Farzuha Marlin Shahid, a Chartered Accountant and a professional in management delivered the lecture at the SFHQ-MLT. General Officers Commanding of under-command Divisions, Brigade Commanders, Commanding Officers and Senior Officers attended the event.
